name: Orbit Inferno: The Haunted Dream of a Greedy Nerd
name_original: Orbit Inferno: The Haunted Dream of a Greedy Nerd
description:
Orbit Inferno: The Haunted Dream of a Greedy Nerd is a roguelike game in which the choices made during the game also affect the enemies.

This combined with an orbital movement of the player and bullets make Orbit Inferno one of a kind.

The game was created by the Nexadata team, a small Italian development team, for the Epic Megajam 2022.

For any information please contact: info@nexadata.it
